TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataControlFieldCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection
Public NotInheritable Class DataControlFieldCollection Inherits StateManagedCollection
public ref class DataControlFieldCollection sealed : System::Web::UI::StateManagedCollection

summary.span: 表示由 和 等資料繫結控制項所使用的 物件集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that are used by data-bound controls such as and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示的集合資料繫結控制項用來指定其子控制項的呈現方式的物件。The class represents a collection of objects used by data-bound controls to specify how their child controls are presented. 類別衍生自，特別用來儲存的抽象基底的集合類別物件。The class derives from , an abstract base collection class used specifically to store objects. A物件會影響行為的物件。A object influences the behavior of a object. 在還原狀態時，將會重新加入至控制項以動態方式加入至集合的物件。 objects that are dynamically added to the collection will be re-added to the control when state is restored. 這表示，欄位必須新增、 移除或變更一次，而不是在每次回傳中，因為需要在 ASP.NET 中的大部分集合型別。This means that a field needs to be added, removed, or changed just once instead of on each postback, as most collection types in ASP.NET require. (類別會實作介面，讓它能夠將其狀態儲存在 ASP.NET 檢視狀態。(The class implements the interface, which enables it to store its state in ASP.NET view state. )) 使用類別以程式設計方式管理一組物件。Use the class to programmatically manage a set of objects. 請注意，較常見的宣告方式定義這些欄位。Note that it is more common to define these fields declaratively. 您可以新增、 插入和移除物件使用的適當方法類別。You can add, insert, and remove objects using the appropriate methods of the class. 若要以程式設計方式擷取物件集合，可使用下列方法之一：To programmatically retrieve objects from a collection, use one of following methods: - 使用索引子以取得單一使用陣列標記法，從集合的物件。Use the indexer to get a single object from the collection using array notation. - 使用方法用來建立-實作的物件，然後可以用來從集合取得項目。Use the method to create a -implemented object, which can then be used to get items from the collection. 屬性集合中指定的項目總數，和通常用來判斷集合中的上限。The property specifies the total number of items in the collection, and is commonly used to determine the upper bound of the collection. 您可以將項目加入和移除集合的項目， ， ，和方法。You can add items to and remove items from the collection using the , , , and methods. 如果您使用或控制會自動建立的物件 (例如，當屬性是`true`) 不會儲存在可公開存取的欄位集合。If you are using the or control, the objects that are automatically created (for example, when the property is `true`) are not stored in the publicly accessible fields collection. 您只可以存取和操作不會自動產生的物件。You can only access and manipulate objects that are not automatically generated. 下表列出不同的資料控制項欄位類別和其使用方式。The following table lists the different data control field classes and how they are used. |參數類別Parameter Class|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||所有欄位的抽象基底類別。The abstract base class for all fields.| ||用來繫結至文字或從 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項擷取資料繫結的資料控制項欄位。A data-bound control field that is used to bind to text or data retrieved from an ASP.NET data source control.| ||封裝一般按鈕功能繫結的資料控制項欄位。A data-bound control field that encapsulates general button functionality. 和從中衍生。 and are derived from it.| ||繫結的資料控制項欄位顯示至少一個按鈕。A data-bound control field that displays at least one button.| ||顯示的繫結的資料控制項欄位控制項。A data-bound control field that displays a control.| ||顯示執行的動作，可以藉由資料列 （或資料行），例如顯示的資料編輯、 更新或刪除的資料繫結控制項欄位。A data-bound control field that displays actions that can be performed on the data displayed by the row (or column), such as edit, update, or delete.| ||顯示的繫結的資料控制項欄位控制項。A data-bound control field that displays a control.| ||顯示的繫結的資料控制項欄位控制項。A data-bound control field that displays an control.| ||顯示資料繫結控制項中的自訂內容繫結的資料控制項欄位。A data-bound control field that displays custom content in a data-bound control.|

span.span: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將附加物件至集合結尾。Use the method to append a object to the end of the collection. 此方法的實作會採用所指定的物件`field`參數，並將它附加至集合。This implementation of the method takes the object specified by the `field` parameter and appends it to the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以動態方式加入物件到控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to dynamically add a object to a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法用來建立一份目前的集合。Use the method to create a copy of the current collection. 這個方法主要是由設計階段對話方塊用於取消作業時，實作復原行為。This method is used primarily by design-time dialog boxes to implement rollback behavior when an operation is canceled.
